version_description:
1.Increase the symbol completion
2.Convert richtext to pdf
3.Fix some bugs
4.File format fwrt support pictures and text

Dear Apple:
My app need to play audio at the background. In the Python Tab, click the left button in the navigation bar, the button with name "《", then you will enter the Learn interface. click the "MyCode FilePath" cell. the you will enter the file system. scroll the buttons of bellow, then you can find one button for record voice. click the button to record some voice , then you can play record voice at background.

Please Help me
Good Luck!
